title: Terraform Industries: Synthetic Natural Gas from Atmospheric Carbon
summary: Terraform Industries develops technology to produce low-cost synthetic natural gas through atmospheric hydrocarbon synthesis
content: Raised $26M for Mark One Terraformer development, Achieved 99.4% methane purity with Gen 4 reactor, Producing pipeline-grade natural gas from sunlight and CO2, Green hydrogen at <$2.50/kg-H2, Direct Air Capture CO2 at <$250/T-CO2, Expanding team with technical hires, Featured in The Economist, Developing 1 MW scale Terraformers
